The table below shows the scores gained in listening quiz 3 for each type of listening skill.
As you can see, this quiz focused a lot more on connecting content. Connecting content tested your ability to connect the detailed information in the lecture to the correct summary of the key point. This made this test a little harder than previous tests and required strong note taking.
